https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ykn7QJ2qbqkU4EfN16mbdvozYAt.jpg Sonja, an attractive blonde, picks up a man with a foreign accent in a bar. He quotes the Persian poet Hafiz to her and tells her he's a writer working on an erotic story about a man and woman who meet in a bar. She invites him to go home with her for the next part of the story - and everything goes wrong. An Erotic Tale
